name: Grand Sierra Resort & Casino
description: Grand Sierra Resort is Northern Nevada's largest casino resort, offering luxury rooms, 2,000+ slots, poker, nightlife, fine dining, and live concerts. Less than 15 minutes from multiple championship golf courses, it's the perfect hub for golfers visiting Reno and the High Sierra.
shortDescription: Northern Nevada's largest casino resort with 2,000+ slots, live entertainment, and direct access to top Reno golf courses.
highlights: Resort-style pool with cabanas & hot tubs

faqs.question: How close is Grand Sierra Resort to golf courses?
faqs.answer: Less than 15 minutes from Red Hawk Golf & Resort, LakeRidge Golf Course, and Wolf Run Golf Club.

faqs.question: Does GSR offer golf packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra offers custom packages combining lodging at GSR with tee times at top Reno-Tahoe courses. Call 888-584-8232.

faqs.question: What entertainment does GSR offer after golf?
faqs.answer: The Grand Theatre hosts concerts and comedy, Lex Nightclub features live DJs, plus bowling, arcade, go-karts, and a luxury cinema.

faqs.question: How far is GSR from the airport?
faqs.answer: Just 5 minutes from Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

meta.title: Grand Sierra Resort Reno | Casino, Dining & Golf Stay Packages
meta.description: Stay at Northern Nevada's largest casino resort. 2,000+ slots, live concerts, fine dining, and custom golf packages with 20+ courses.

testimonials.quote: We've stayed at several Reno properties for golf trips and Grand Sierra Resort & Casino is now our go-to. Great amenities, solid dining options, and the rooms are comfortable after a long day on the course.
testimonials.author: Angela R.

testimonials.quote: Our conference group of 40 stayed at Grand Sierra Resort & Casino. Meeting rooms were perfect, the rooms were comfortable, and being in Reno meant we could add golf days to the agenda. GTHS made the whole package seamless.
testimonials.author: David O.

testimonials.quote: Third year in a row staying at Grand Sierra Resort & Casino for our corporate golf outing. Consistency is what matters for group travel and this property delivers every time. Having GTHS handle reservations saves us hours of coordination.
testimonials.author: Tina C.
